verses.verse: <S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> unto a <S%G444>man<s%> that is an <S%G3617>householder<s%>, <S%G3748>which<s%> went <S%G1831>out<s%> early in the <S%G260>morning<s%> <S%G4404><s%> to <S%G3409>hire<s%> <S%G2040>labourers<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G290>vineyard<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> when he had <S%G4856>agreed<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G2040>labourers<s%> <S%G1537>for<s%> a <S%G1220>penny<s%> a <S%G2250>day<s%>, he <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G290>vineyard<s%>. penny: the Roman penny is the eighth part of an ounce, which after five shillings the ounce is seven pence halfpenny; about fourteen cents

<S%G3825>Again<s%> he went <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> the <S%G1623>sixth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1766>ninth<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%>, and <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G5615>likewise<s%>.

They <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3754>Because<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> hath <S%G3409>hired<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%>. He <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G5217>Go<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G290>vineyard<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3739>whatsoever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> <S%G5600>is<s%> <S%G1342>right<s%>, that shall ye <S%G2983>receive<s%>.

<S%G1161>So<s%> when <S%G3798>even<s%> was <S%G1096>come<s%>, the <S%G2962>lord<s%> of the <S%G290>vineyard<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2012>steward<s%>, <S%G2564>Call<s%> the <S%G2040>labourers<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G591>give<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> their <S%G3408>hire<s%>, <S%G756>beginning<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2193>unto<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> when they <S%G2064>came<s%> that were hired <S%G4012>about<s%> the <S%G1734>eleventh<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%>, they <S%G2983>received<s%> every <S%G303>man<s%> a <S%G1220>penny<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> when the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%>, they <S%G3543>supposed<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> they should have <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G4119>more<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G2532>likewise<s%> <S%G2983>received<s%> every <S%G846>man<s%> <S%G303><s%> a <S%G1220>penny<s%>.
<S%G1161>And<s%> when they had <S%G2983>received<s%> it, they <S%G1111>murmured<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> the goodman of the <S%G3617>house<s%>,

<S%G1161>But<s%> he <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of <S%G846>them<s%>, and <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G2083>Friend<s%>, I <S%G91>do<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G91>wrong<s%>: <S%G4856>didst<s%> <S%G3780>not<s%> thou <S%G4856>agree<s%> with <S%G3427>me<s%> for a <S%G1220>penny<s%>?

<S%G142>Take<s%> that <S%G4674>thine<s%> is, <S%G2532>and<s%> go thy <S%G5217>way<s%><S%G1161>:<s%> I <S%G2309>will<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> unto <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G2078>last<s%>, <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee<s%>.

<S%G2228><s%> Is it <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1832>lawful<s%> for <S%G3427>me<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> I <S%G2309>will<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> mine <S%G1699>own<s%><S%G1487>?<s%> <S%G2076>Is<s%> <S%G4675>thine<s%> <S%G3788>eye<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G18>good<s%>?

<S%G3779>So<s%> the <S%G2078>last<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2078>last<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1526>be<s%> <S%G2822>called<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3641>few<s%> <S%G1588>chosen<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> going <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G3880>took<s%> the <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2596>apart<s%> <S%G2398><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>,

<S%G2400>Behold<s%>, we go <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> shall be <S%G3860>betrayed<s%> unto the chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> unto the <S%G1122>scribes<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> they shall <S%G2632>condemn<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> to <S%G2288>death<s%>,

<S%G2532>And<s%> shall <S%G3860>deliver<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> to the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1702>mock<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G3146>scourge<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G4717>crucify<s%> him: <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> he shall rise <S%G450>again<s%>.

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> the <S%G3384>mother<s%> of <S%G2199>Zebedee's<s%> <S%G5207>children<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G5207>sons<s%>, <S%G4352>worshipping<s%> him, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G154>desiring<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G3844>thing<s%> of <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>her<s%>, <S%G5101>What<s%> wilt <S%G2309>thou<s%>? She <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2036>Grant<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5207>sons<s%> may <S%G2523>sit<s%>, the <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> right <S%G1188>hand<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1520>other<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> the <S%G2176>left<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%>.

Are ye <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G4095>drink<s%> of the <S%G4221>cup<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G3195>shall<s%> drink <S%G4095>of<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to be <S%G907>baptized<s%> with the <S%G908>baptism<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> am baptized <S%G907>with<s%>? They <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, We are <S%G1410>able<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Ye shall <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> of <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4221>cup<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> be <S%G907>baptized<s%> with the <S%G908>baptism<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> am baptized <S%G907>with<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> to <S%G2523>sit<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> right <S%G1188>hand<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2176>left<s%>, <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1699>mine<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> it shall be given to them for <S%G3739>whom<s%> it is <S%G2090>prepared<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> when the <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> it, they were moved with <S%G23>indignation<s%> <S%G4012>against<s%> the <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4341>called<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> unto him, and <S%G2036>said<s%>, Ye <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G758>princes<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> exercise dominion <S%G2634>over<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> they that are <S%G3173>great<s%> exercise authority <S%G2715>upon<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> it <S%G2071>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>: <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3739>whosoever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> <S%G2309>will<s%> <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, let him <S%G2077>be<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1249>minister<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3739>whosoever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> <S%G2309>will<s%> <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G4413>chief<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, let him <S%G2077>be<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1401>servant<s%>:

Even <S%G5618>as<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> to be ministered <S%G1247>unto<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> to <S%G1247>minister<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5590>life<s%> a <S%G3083>ransom<s%> <S%G473>for<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> as <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G1607>departed<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2410>Jericho<s%>, a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, <S%G1417>two<s%> blind <S%G5185>men<s%> <S%G2521>sitting<s%> by the <S%G3598>way<s%> <S%G3844>side<s%>, when they <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> passed <S%G3855>by<s%>, cried <S%G2896>out<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, Have <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on <S%G2248>us<s%>, O <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, thou <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G1138>David<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2443>because<s%> they should hold their <S%G4623>peace<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> they <S%G2896>cried<s%> the <S%G3185>more<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, Have <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on <S%G2248>us<s%>, O <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, thou <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G1138>David<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> stood <S%G2476>still<s%>, and <S%G5455>called<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G5101>What<s%> will <S%G2309>ye<s%> that I shall <S%G4160>do<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>?
They <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> may be <S%G455>opened<s%>.

<S%G1161>So<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G4697>compassion<s%> on them, and <S%G680>touched<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> received <S%G308>sight<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.
